Question: This person regularly attends the most important services of the Russian Orthodox Church on the main Orthodox Christian holidays.
Hints: This person also holds a 6th dan black belt in Kyokushin kaikan karate.
This person joined the KGB in 1975 upon graduation, and underwent a year's training at the 401st KGB school in Okhta, Leningrad.
In April 2008, this person was put on the Time 100 most influential people in the world list.
